What makes you think they would have a new champion released as Worlds Championship is happening?

If you aren't aware, they will still release Kindred in this patch WHILE Worlds is occurring because Worlds uses patch 5.18 instead of 5.19, so Kindred i am pretty certain will not be played in worlds...

Its been in the news features for two weeks as an upcoming change.

Does anyone know if league of legends of even riot games will have a presence at eb expo on the weekend. I haven't seen anything about it on either of their websites, and it would be a shame if they weren't there.

Hi Ninjachicken737,
Due to our massive focus on the OPL finals that were held in Sydney and the upcoming IWCA being played in Melbourne, we are not attending PAX this year.
EDIT: my bad, I meant we are not attending PAX or EB expo

Wait, isnt EB Expo and PAX two different events?
(#ISEEWHATYOUDIDTHERE)
ok. thanks for the reply

Regarding IP Helper enabling:
Does IPv6 safely work with the client now?
(since IP Helper is the service for IPv6)

I haven't been able to open the launcher since the patch. I'm on Windows 8.1 and I haven't had an issue opening League until today. I've tried opening it as an administrator and run it in compatibility mode. I then uninstalled it to reinstall it again. But I still can't open the launcher to reinstall files.
wow nice man thx {{summoner:1}}
